body:
Hello,


What is the best way to search the Radiance Online archives?


I am trying to find the obj/misc directory of my newly-installed NREL 
Radiance download on my Mac to run the "%  rad -o x11 daf.rif" as the 
ReadMe.pdf file suggests. (I'm also trying to find the "ray" directory 
and the "rad" command, but that is secondary.)


Thank you,




*Jill Dalglish, PE, LEED AP BD+C*
___
